infotexts:
Scan Hook Detonate Timed Mode Reset Safety Next Page Remove Embrace The Abyss Thruster Blade Reload Laser Pointer Lights Tactical Light Tactical Device Sonar Map On/Off
Pan Of A Man A Pan that belongs to a Man. A Pan of Man, a Man of Pan. Manpan, Panman. Eternal Honk Of Great Calamity An ancient forbidden artifact, posessing great power of randomness, sillyness and destruction. Corporal Coin The most stable currency in the world. Throw the coin and hit it with bullet to deal damage to all creatures except humans. Wrench O'Ptimization A wrench that only the most valiant and strong engineers of Europa may wield. May cause lag :) Hook If you see this item, then next shot will fire a hook that pulls enemies towards you. Weaponry Terminal Terminals allow you to instantly get any item of given category in any amount. They are used for testing purposes and on Shooting Range. Ammunition Terminal Terminals allow you to instantly get any item of given category in any amount. They are used for testing purposes and on Shooting Range. Attachments Terminal Terminals allow you to instantly get any item of given category in any amount. They are used for testing purposes and on Shooting Range.
Move ‖color:gui.blue‖[bonusmovement]%‖end‖ faster in an ‖color:gui.orange‖Exoskeleton‖end‖. Separatist Ushanka(A.S.S) The Alcohol Suppliment System, A.S.S for short! With this upgrade a steady stream of happy juice, be it ethanol or rum, will be constantly supplied directly to your brain. Great for morale! Heavy Riot Helmet(Infrared Scanner) Addition of an old-gen infrared scanner taht, when activated, grants a brief period of ‖color:gui.orange‖thermal goggles effect‖end‖. Takes some time to reload between scans, consumes ‖color:gui.orange‖batteries‖end‖. Heavy Riot Helmet(Improved Headgear) Installation of a ‖color:gui.green‖powerful flashlight‖end‖ and a ‖color:gui.green‖better visor‖end‖. Makes this helmet a good choice for underwater exploration. Heavy Riot Helmet(Alien Alloy Plating) Complete replacement of standard armor with new one of alien materials. Greatly increases protection and toughness. DES-12 Military diving exoskeleton(Nuclear Power Unit) Replacement of standard battery-fed power unit with a miniature reactor and a portable oxygen generator. ‖color:gui.green‖fuel rods‖end‖ last significantly longer and produce overall higher amounts of power. ‖color:gui.purple‖Fulgurium fuel rods‖end‖ overdrive the system similar to how their battery counterparts do. Wrist Blade Press the Blade button to retract. DES-12 Military diving exoskeleton(Wrist Blade) Addition of a ‖color:gui.orange‖blade‖end‖ to your left wrist that can be retracted with a press of a buton. Once out, it occupies the left hand slot. Deals significant damage, allowing wearer to easily rip and tear their way through armor and flesh. Heavy riot armor(Lightweight Armor) ‖color:gui.blue‖No more movement penalties‖end‖ with these new plates of aluminium alloy. ‖color:gui.red‖Armor toughness has been decreased‖end‖ and ‖color:gui.red‖pouches were removed‖end‖ but now this vest is a perfect option for risky repairs as it grants perfect protection against shrapnel and ‖color:gui.blue‖resists water flow‖end‖ a bit. Heavy riot armor(Auto-injector) Installation of an ‖color:gui.green‖emergency injector‖end‖ on the place of ‖color:gui.red‖ammunition pouches‖end‖. Combat helmet(Belt) Soldiers of old earth used to wrap leather belts around their helmets carrying their personal things and ammunition. This upgrade does practically the same, allowing you to ‖color:gui.green‖carry one magazine‖end‖ and ‖color:gui.green‖up to 5 rounds‖end‖ on your helmet. Military body armor(Additional Plating) Equip this vest with additional pieces that protect your shoulders, arms and thighs as well as some extra flak armor for the body improving ‖color:gui.green‖overall explosion resistances‖end‖ and ‖color:gui.green‖armor coverage‖end‖. Comes at a cost of ‖color:gui.red‖lower mobility‖end‖. Military body armor(Foldable Body) This upgrade allows you to ‖color:gui.green‖store‖end‖ this armor piece in your inventory and smaller containers. ‖color:gui.red‖Ammunition pouches‖end‖ are sacrificed to allow this. Balaklava(Edgy Print) Terrify your enemies with this cool and original print of a skull on your mask. Tactical observation helmet(Better Display) This upgrade allows you to ‖color:gui.green‖hide‖end‖ the annoying red display with no real downsides. Provides additional ‖color:gui.Blue‖protection from flashbangs‖end‖. AAS Tactical Visor(Better Display) This upgrade allows you to ‖color:gui.green‖hide‖end‖ the annoying red display with no real downsides. Provides additional ‖color:gui.Blue‖protection from flashbangs‖end‖. 'Ricochet' Active protection system(Tactical Pouches) Repurposing some empty space inside this backpack into contaners allows you to ‖color:gui.green‖carry up to 3 stacks of small items‖end‖ inside it. Improvised Armored Diving Suit(Improved Headgear) ‖color:gui.green‖Improves visibility‖end‖, ‖color:gui.green‖provides clear hearing‖end‖ while wearing the suit and ‖color:gui.green‖prevents you from getting Shooter's Ear‖end‖. Tactical Helmet(Turret Interface Linkage) Turret Interface Linkage system allows wearer to ‖color:gui.green‖operate turrets with greater responsiveness‖end‖, increasing their ‖color:gui.green‖firerate‖end‖ and general combat effeciency. However this comes at a cost of ‖color:gui.red‖severely reduced protection‖end‖ and ‖color:gui.red‖armor toughness‖end‖. Tactical Helmet(Improved Visibility Kit) Addition of ‖color:gui.orange‖thermal optics‖end‖ and a bright ‖color:gui.green‖flashligt‖end‖. Requires ‖color:gui.orange‖batteries‖end‖ to function, can be toggled on and off. PUCS(Oxygen Thrusters) When toggled on, these thrusters allow you to ‖color:gui.blue‖move faster underwater‖end‖, like underwater scooter does. Unlike underwater scooter however, this upgrade works in any direction and ‖color:gui.orange‖consumes oxygen‖end‖ instead of batteries. Aim and press attack while moving to activate thrusters. Dont mind this item Untill devs fix ItemContainer bug(2nd container cannot be referred to via target="Contained") youll sadly have to see this item here. Dont try to remove it nor interract with it. It allows you to use your upgrade. Tick box spawns or despawns this item according to its state. PUCS(Shield Generator) Shield Generator ‖color:gui.green‖reduces all incoming damage by 20%‖end‖ when powered, but consumes large amounts of energy. This system is designed to use ‖color:gui.purple‖fulgurium batteries‖end‖, draining standard ones dry almost instantly. Dashing Module Press Ragdoll button while in water to propell yourslef in the direction of your movement. Ready to Dash The boosters have recharged, press Ragdoll button while underwater to perform a dash. Slipsuit(Booster Kit) A set of special thrusters installed on this suits back propell it in any direction you want for a brief moment. Takes some time to recharge, ‖color:gui.red‖only works underwater‖end‖. Slipsuit(Stealth Coating) Addition of new experimental stealth coating allows wearer to become ‖color:gui.green‖fully invisible‖end‖ to everyone while ‖color:gui.red‖standing still‖end‖ and also passivly acts as a camouflage, reducing chance of being spotted by hostile creatures. Invisibility requires ‖color:gui.orange‖batteries‖end‖ to work. Bleeding wont allow you to go invisible. Cloaked You are invisible to hostile creatures. Stealth Module While wearing ‖color:gui.orange‖[suit]‖end‖, stand still for [sec] second to become invisible for hostile creatures. Abyss Diving Suit(Phys-Alloy Plating) Replacement of standard titanium armor with new, more durable one made of alien materials. Greatly ‖color:gui.green‖increases armor toughness‖end‖ as well as provides better protection against physical damage with no real drawbacks. Abyss Diving Suit(Acoustic Sensors) A set of acoustic sensors allows you to scan the area around you much like mobile sonars do. Equipped with a ‖color:gui.green‖mineral locator‖end‖ and a navigation system that maps out your surroundings, allowing you to easily navigate around wrecks and ruins, requires ‖color:gui.orange‖battery cells‖end‖ to function. Abyss Diving Suit(Mobility Enhancement) Addition of special fins as well as removing some weight from suit's body by getting rid of heavy armor plates and replacing standard joints with more flexible new ones greatly ‖color:gui.blue‖increases mobility‖end‖ of this suit, ‖color:gui.red‖reducing protection‖end‖ in exchange. Abyss Diving Suit(Electric Rebreather) A special rebreathing device recycles wearer's breath as well as functions as a miniature oxygen generator. Now this suit requires ‖color:gui.orange‖battery cells‖end‖ instead of oxygen tank. Body Armor(Tactical Pouches) This upgrade ‖color:gui.green‖provides additional space‖end‖ for ammunition, medicine and a small item of your choice. Body Armor(Ceramic Plating) Replacement of standard metal plates with their ceramic counterparts. This ‖color:gui.green‖doubles armor toughness‖end‖ and increases protection slightly as well. Combat Diving Suit(Emergency Medical System) Emergency Medical System(EMS) applies immediate medical aid to wearer, constantly ‖color:gui.green‖reducing bleeding‖end‖ and ‖color:gui.green‖decreasing chance of getting Husk Infection‖end‖. However this system also ‖color:gui.red‖increases suits oxygen consumption rate‖end‖. Combat Diving Suit(Reinforced Body) Replacement of standard armor plates with their copies of alien materials as well as reinforcement of limb joints ‖color:gui.blue‖improves suit's depth limit up to 9000 meters‖end‖ and ‖color:gui.green‖increases toughness‖end‖ of its armor. Sadly this comes at a cost of slightly ‖color:gui.red‖reduced mobility‖end‖. Combat Diving Suit(Tactical Observation Interface) Addition of AAS set to the suit's visor greatly increases wearer's performance in ranged combat but at same time introduces ‖color:gui.red‖red display‖end‖ of outdated model which may annoy some operatives. Provides additional ‖color:gui.Blue‖protection from flashbangs‖end‖. Combat Diving Suit(Improved Headgear) ‖color:gui.green‖Improves visibility‖end‖, ‖color:gui.green‖provides clear hearing‖end‖ while wearing the suit and ‖color:gui.green‖prevents you from getting Shooter's Ear‖end‖. Combat Diving Suit(Electric Rebreather) A special rebreathing device recycles wearer's breath as well as functions as a miniature oxygen generator. Now this suit requires ‖color:gui.orange‖battery cells‖end‖ instead of oxygen tank. Diving Suit(Flak Armor) Body of this diving suit is reinforced with kevlar fiber, additional armor plates are installed on limbs. This greatly ‖color:gui.green‖reduces damage‖end‖ taken from explosions and schrapnel, however ‖color:gui.red‖elemental protection is sacrificed‖end‖ in order to retain mobility. Diving Suit(Cargo Belt) Addition of a special belt with pockets allows you to ‖color:gui.green‖carry up to 3 of small items‖end‖ on this suit. Diving Suit(HazMat Protection) Additional layer of lead plates and rubber ‖color:gui.green‖provides greater protection‖end‖ against harmful elements, like radiation and husk parasites. However this plating is installed instead of standard titanium armor, slightly ‖color:gui.red‖decreasing suit's protection‖end‖ against physical damage. Diving Suit(Improved Headgear) ‖color:gui.green‖Improves visibility‖end‖, ‖color:gui.green‖provides clear hearing‖end‖ while wearing the suit and ‖color:gui.green‖prevents you from getting Shooter's Ear‖end‖. Diving Suit(Mobility Enhancement) Mobility Enhancement allows you to ‖color:gui.blue‖move quicker‖end‖ in your diving suit without any drawbacks. ‖color:gui.blue‖No movement speed penalty‖end‖ as well as ‖color:gui.blue‖10% swimming and gliding speed increase‖end‖.
MH-15 Boarding Shotgun Also known as Doomstick, this double-barrel ‖color:gui.green‖shotgun‖end‖ comes with a ‖color:gui.orange‖grappling hook‖end‖ that can be used to pull enemies into its effective range, finishing them with two devastative shotgun shots from up close. M600 Commando A standard police ‖color:gui.green‖shotgun‖end‖, that had undergone numerous modifications. This weapon was repurposed to be fired from the hip and ‖color:gui.blue‖is capable of shooting underwater‖end‖ thanks to new dementonite reciever. Its stock was cut down and pump-action mechanism was modified to allow slamfire, a custom choke was also permanently installed at the end of the barrel. M3 Double-Barrel Shotgun A simple double-barrel ‖color:gui.green‖shotgun‖end‖, manufactured by chinese colonies. The cheapest 12g gun out of all, ‖color:gui.red‖isnt capable of shooting underwater‖end‖. M12 Assault Shotgun A short combat ‖color:gui.green‖shotgun‖end‖, capable of being slamfired. Perfect weapon for breaching operations in closed quarters, but loses to almost any other shotgun in terms of accuraccy. Pipe shotgun Simple weapon, made of pipes and broken tool parts. As all makeshift weapons, this ‖color:gui.green‖shotgun‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖has a chance to jam upon firing‖end‖ and ‖color:gui.red‖is not capable of shooting underwater‖end‖. Franchi SFS-12 Self-spoken legendary ‖color:gui.green‖shotgun‖end‖. Outstanding firerate and accuracy as well as ‖color:gui.blue‖underwater-shooting ability‖end‖ makes it ideal for narrow hulls and caves, however only few of them were brought to Europa and the weapon was never mass-manufactured. TOZ-208 Hammer Trusty ‖color:gui.green‖shotgun‖end‖, used by hunters and breachers for over 75 years. This modification comes with folding stock and ‖color:gui.blue‖is capable of shooting underwater‖end‖. M-820 Breacher Lightweight ‖color:gui.green‖shotgun‖end‖, developed for narrow coridors and closed quarters. Widely used by Coalition's police and special-taskers, earned its name as an ideal weapon for devastating no-knock raids. ‖color:gui.blue‖Shoots underwater‖end‖. Saiga A18 Heavy automatic ‖color:gui.green‖shotgun‖end‖, based on AK-like rifle. Unlike most Saigas, this one doesnt feed from detachable magazines, but uses its own tube under the barrel. Fabrication requires some parts of another shotgun - ‖color:gui.orange‖TOZ-208‖end‖. TSG-88 Semi-automatic combat ‖color:gui.green‖shotgun‖end‖, capable of firing at incredibly fast rate. Was a common part of special squad's equipment on earth, but only few of them made their way to Europa. TOZ Shaitan An unidentified double-barrel ‖color:gui.green‖shotgun‖end‖, illegally shipped to Europa by russian colonists, never was intended to be used underwater, but for some reason ‖color:gui.blue‖is capable of doing so‖end‖. There's a inscription on the stock, saying: ‖color:gui.orange‖Djahnem?‖end‖ M600 police shotgun Mossberg's most known weapon on Europa. Most commonly seen as a outpost police ‖color:gui.green‖shotgun‖end‖, this weapon can hardly be called a reliable tool for hunting, since it was ‖color:gui.red‖not made for underwater usage‖end‖.
SR-22 Kaiman Precise semi-automatic ‖color:gui.green‖9x39‖end‖ rifle with relatively low recoil. Was developed as a reliable marksman weapon with a subsonic round for coalitions special task forces. A219-E Used mostly by special-task operators, this russian prototype rifle may be considered the peak of assault rifles for it's stopping power, accuracy and rate of fire. Uses ‖color:gui.green‖9x39‖end‖ magazines. OTSE-GK(9x39) Unusual assault rifle that can be rechambered with nothing, but a kit of parts and a milfabricator. Performs perfectly both ‖color:gui.blue‖underwater‖end‖ and in air. ‖color:gui.orange‖Underslung grenade laucher‖end‖ allows to shoot 40mm frag grenades. SR-14 A very uncommon weapon, chambered in ‖color:gui.green‖9x39‖end‖. Few blueprints of SR-14 were brought to Europa by russian colonists, however this rifle was never fabricated since then.
Colt Biden M9 A wide-spread single-action revolver, named after a famous marksman of old Earth, who according to the legends could blow a lung out of the opponents body with a single precise 9mm shot. Can be modified with ‖color:gui.orange‖Booster Coil‖end‖ despite being chambered in ‖color:gui.green‖9x19‖end‖. MP-22 Commando A deeply modified MP-22K, equipped with SD suppression kit, replacing the majority of barrel with ‖color:gui.orange‖integrated silencer‖end‖. Internal components were reinforced with alien materials, thus granting this weapon an ‖color:gui.blue‖ability to shoot underwater‖end‖. A ‖color:gui.orange‖3-shot 12g pump-action shotgun‖end‖ was mounted under the barrel to increase its firepower at close ranges. Uses ‖color:gui.green‖9x19‖end‖ magazines. MD-SD Concealable Unidentified submachinegun without a stock. Features an ‖color:gui.orange‖integrated silencer‖end‖, similar to the one on MP-22SD. Internal components are made of a strange shiny silver alloy. This weapon noticably lacks any signs of wear or rust, even the smallest scratches, like it has never been used. Uses ‖color:gui.green‖9x19‖end‖ magazines. SL-293 Also known as Admiral Martel's self-loading pistol, SL-293 was developed to be produced in large quantities while still retaining underwater shooting ability and high accuraccy. However the concept has proved to be unreliable and the pistol never seen factory production. Uses ‖color:gui.green‖9x19 SMG magazines‖end‖. Konjurin's Wrath A weapon devastating by its very nature, wielding power of The Flame itself. A strong enough vessel, to withstand The Flame. A shard of The Flame, contained in metal walls. Honk-9 How far is a comedy from a tragedy? No further than ‖color:gui.green‖9 millimeters‖end‖. MP-22K Developed for Earth's police officers, this ‖color:gui.green‖9x19‖end‖ submachinegun is widely used on Europa for it's intended purposes, despite it ‖color:gui.red‖was never made to work underwater‖end‖. MK-51 Tactical carbine Burst-fire ‖color:gui.green‖9x19‖end‖ carbine, deadly at long ranges, but loses counteractions up close due to slower firerate. CZE-900 Mauler Rapid-firing, precise ‖color:gui.green‖9x19‖end‖ submachinegun, developed for underwater usage. Soon after the launch, it was banned by coalition as a inhumane weapon. The only drawbacks are it's size and weight. HKE MP-19SD Fast-firing, silent smg, used by mercenaries all over the Europa, chambered in standard ‖color:gui.green‖9x19‖end‖. Small size and ‖color:gui.blue‖ability of underwater shooting‖end‖ made it one of the best options for operations on medium and small ranges. Beretta M36 Fast-firing compact submachinegun, compensating what it lacks in accuracy with firerate. Burns through ammo quickly, but has a rather good stopping power, uses standard ‖color:gui.green‖9x19‖end‖ SMG magazines. Beretta M87 Simple ‖color:gui.green‖9x19‖end‖ submachinegun, ‖color:gui.blue‖constructed for underwater usage‖end‖. Despite relatively low fire rate, the advantage of underwater shooting makes m87 a demanded weapon. M71 Pistol Light burst-fire ‖color:gui.green‖9x19‖end‖ pistol, capable of quickly dishing out a lot of damage at close range. Has high recoil and relatively low accuracy. MP-681 Blackbird Light ‖color:gui.green‖9x19‖end‖ pistol, made for special forces and shipped to europa by their former operators. Became popular for it's ‖color:gui.blue‖ability to work underwater‖end‖ and accuracy. Improvised 9x19 smg Improvised open-bolt submachinegun, made of rusty pipes and scrap. As all makeshift weapons, this one ‖color:gui.red‖has a chance to jam upon firing‖end‖ and ‖color:gui.red‖is not capable of shooting underwater‖end‖. P-8 Pilot Most common weapon on whole Europa. Cheap and effective, this ‖color:gui.green‖9x19‖end‖ pistol became an essential part of every single submarine crew's arsenal. ‖color:gui.red‖Can't shoot underwater‖end‖.
Remington Mod9-17(Obrez) A tradition of making Obrez version of rifles has went through hundreds of years and even made its way to Europa. This is a shortened rifle with its barrel and stock cut down, allowing it to be carried as a sidearm. Uses ‖color:gui.green‖7.62x55‖end‖ ammunition. Dokaira Type-62 Rifle An old-fashioned japanise rifle with a ‖color:gui.orange‖on-barrel device‖end‖, that allows it to fire 40mm grenades. Effective at long ranges, uses ‖color:gui.green‖7.62x55‖end‖ rounds. Pipe rifle(7.62x55) Simple weapon, made of pipes and broken tool parts. As all makeshift weapons, this one ‖color:gui.red‖has a chance to jam upon firing‖end‖ and ‖color:gui.red‖is not capable of shooting underwater‖end‖. SVD-55ME Heavy semi-automatic rifle, chambered in ‖color:gui.green‖7.62x55‖end‖, factured by the Dragunov's concern. A dozen of them were shipped to Europa where they were used as a long-ranged sniper rifle. Uses it's own ‖color:gui.green‖7.62x55‖end‖ magazines. R-100 Heavy Revolver Bulky ‖color:gui.green‖7.62x55‖end‖ revolver, designed for underwater hunting. Drum holds up to 3 rounds. Earned its name as one of the heftiest handguns on Europa. Remington Mod9-17 Bolt-action ‖color:gui.green‖7.62x55‖end‖ rifle. Commonly used as a hunting weapon, but penetration power of round makes it ideal for fighting against armored people. DVL-16E Vimpel Silent and precise ‖color:gui.green‖7.62x55‖end‖ rifle, developed for russian saboteur squads back on Earth. few blueprints of Vimpels were brought to Europa, however rifle was never used since then. Ideal weapon for silent takedown of any target. A7 Raptor Semi-automatic rifle, chambered in ‖color:gui.green‖7.62x55‖end‖ with integrated magazine. The most unique feature of this weapon is, obviously, a ‖color:gui.green‖sonar scope‖end‖, hard-mounted on top, allowing user to engage targets with no need to see them directly. SVU-39M Heavy ‖color:gui.green‖7.62x55‖end‖ rifle, develop as a replacement for SVD-55ME. Bullpup layout makes this gun relativly more agile and easier to handle in closed spaces but also increases the recoil effect and decreases stability. Uses ‖color:gui.green‖7.62x55‖end‖ magazines.
MG3ME A heavy ‖color:gui.green‖7.62 Kurz‖end‖ machinegun, brought to Europa by italian colonists. It's size made it impossible to replicate with standard fabricators, meaning that MG3ME exists in a single copy. Cannot be modified. M21 Light A light ‖color:gui.green‖7.62 Kurz‖end‖ machinegun, used by police and special-task groups, while operating inside of outposts and submarines. Simple construction and reliability made M21 a popular choice for close combat. Unfortunatly, this machinegun ‖color:gui.red‖is not capable of firing underwater‖end‖. M54 Chainsaw LMG A boxy ‖color:gui.green‖7.62 Kurz‖end‖ machinegun, designed by Coalition as a powerfull suppression and fire support weapon for its assault groups. This must be the heaviest weapon you've operated so far. A102 Light Machinegun A compact light ‖color:gui.green‖7.62 Kurz‖end‖ machinegun, designed as a part of joint weaponry program between Russia and NATO. Chambered in ‖color:gui.green‖7.62 Kurz‖end‖, this gun provides massive firepower in closed quarters, ‖color:gui.blue‖does not fear water and pressure‖end‖ of Europas depths and serves reliably to anyone, capable of wielding its recoil. MPAG-62 Burton-Degtyarev Multi-Purpose Assault Gun, this weapon boasts a unique loading mechanism, which allows it to be fed from both ‖color:gui.green‖7.62 Kurz‖end‖ belts and ‖color:gui.green‖7.62x55‖end‖ magazines with ability to switch between them with a flick of a selector switch. A classic case of 'jack-of-all trades, master of none' type of weapon, underperforming compared to both standard mgs and sniper rifles in their own niches, yet being able to somewhat fulfill the roles of both on the battlefield.
MH-61 Breech-loading Single-action ‖color:gui.green‖5.56x45‖end‖ rifle with a lever to pull the breech block backwards, allowing user to load the round directlty into the barrel. At some point these rifles became so wide-spread that even their blueprints were intigrated into military fabricator standard recipe pool. M53 Assault carbine AR-like carbine with fast firing rate and decent accuracy. Uses standard ‖color:gui.green‖5.56x45‖end‖ magazines. ‖color:gui.red‖Unable to shoot underwater‖end‖. M4-29 Commando A modified version of M4-29. Comes with ‖color:gui.orange‖underslung grenade launcher‖end‖, ‖color:gui.orange‖improved muzzle break‖end‖ and ‖color:gui.orange‖tactical light‖end‖. Essential inner parts are replaced with identical ones, but made out of alien materials. HKE-90 Simple, yet effective ‖color:gui.green‖5.56x45‖end‖ assault rifle. Was a standard piece of Nato soldier's arsenal back on Earth. Nowadays on Europa it serves as a heavy police weapon against rioters and terrorists. ‖color:gui.red‖Jams underwater‖end‖. M4-29 Assault rifle Common military rifle, known for it's reliability and accuracy. Good choice for a wealthy marksman, chambered in ‖color:gui.green‖5.56x45‖end‖. TARE-56 Experimental ‖color:gui.green‖5.56x45‖end‖ assault rifle. High accuracy and ‖color:gui.blue‖ability of underwater shooting‖end‖ made it perfect for middle-ranged combat under any circumstances, Europa has to offer. FNE-456 Para Semi-automatic ‖color:gui.green‖5.56x45‖end‖ rifle. Known for its incredible accuracy and large sizes. Used as a long-range weapon outside of outposts and submarines by coalition's special task forces. HKE X-56 Deadly and precise ‖color:gui.green‖5.56x45‖end‖ assault rifle, famous among mercenaries for it's reliability and accuracy. Combined with a ‖color:gui.orange‖flashlight‖end‖ from factory, this rifle provides it's operator with great firepower in air and ‖color:gui.blue‖water‖end‖. G-14K Assault carbine Rapid-firing carbine, capable of firing ‖color:gui.green‖5.56x45‖end‖ ammo in quick bursts of 3. A reliable weapon for close quarters combat. M7A5 Medical Precise ‖color:gui.green‖5.56x45‖end‖ carbine, developed for combat medics. Has a ‖color:gui.orange‖integrated health scanner‖end‖ and ‖color:gui.orange‖underslung syringe launcher‖end‖. Perfect for keeping your squad alive while still having an option to fight back against any threat, ‖color:gui.blue‖no matter the conditions‖end‖. ‖color:gui.red‖Cannot be suppressed or anyhow modified‖end‖.
SKV-25 Carbine Self-loading Volkov's Carbine, or SKV is a precise ‖color:gui.green‖5.45x39‖end‖ rifle with its own fixed magazine, holding 8 bullets. Might not be the most fast-firing gun over there, but one of the most accurate for sure. Has a construction oversight with its muzzle brake, ‖color:gui.red‖incapable of being equipped with Rifle Grenade Launcher‖end‖. AK-27MSU Police rifle Shortened version of AK-27 with folding stock. Was mainly made for tank crews, but found it's use as a police weapon on Europa in early years of colonisation. Uncapable of shooting underwater. Uses ‖color:gui.green‖5.45x39‖end‖ magazines. AEK-22 Special Modern assault rifle, constructed as a response to m4-29. High rate of fire and accuracy made it a perfect choice for close combat, combined with folding stock, this rifle is concidered one of the best ‖color:gui.green‖5.45x39‖end‖ weapons on Europa. AEK-22 Commando Modified AEK-22, accompanied by collimator sight, new polymer stock, ‖color:gui.orange‖tactical flashlight‖end‖ and a ‖color:gui.orange‖bayonet‖end‖. Some inner parts were also replaced by their copies from alien materials, making weapon lighter and more durable. Feeds from ‖color:gui.green‖5.45x39‖end‖ magazines. AK-27ME Veles Semi-automatic rifle, known as one of the most accurate magazine-feeded weapons and the deadliest long-range option among ak pattern. Uses standard ‖color:gui.green‖5.45x39‖end‖ magazines. OTSE-GK(5.45x39) Unusual assault rifle that ‖color:gui.yellow‖can be rechambered‖end‖ with nothing, but a kit of parts and a fabricator. Performs perfectly both ‖color:gui.blue‖underwater‖end‖ and in air. ‖color:gui.orange‖Underslung grenade laucher‖end‖ allows to shoot 40mm frag grenades. Improvised 5.45x39 assault rifle Assault rifle, made of scrap, pipes and tool parts. As all makeshift weapon, this one ‖color:gui.red‖has a chance to jam upon firing‖end‖ and ‖color:gui.red‖is not capable of shooting underwater‖end‖. AK-32MSU Perun A new generation of ak rifles, AK-32 was constructed for harsh europan conditions to serve the role of silent precise rifle for Coalitions special forces. Fires in deadly bursts of 2 bullets, landing almost in the same spot. Uses standard ‖color:gui.green‖5.45x39‖end‖ magazines. AEK-55 Duplet Light ‖color:gui.green‖5.45x39‖end‖ machinegun, firing in quick and deadly bursts of two. Its unique feeding mechanism features a feeding lift and a delayed piston operation, which allows this gun to fire both rounds of the burst almost simultaneously. ACE-72 Valkyrie A precise rifle, offering a in-between variant among ‖color:gui.green‖5.45x39‖end‖ weapons. Not as fast firing as AEK-22, not as accurate as AK-27 Veles, but reliable and trustworthy. A-905 Schkval Rapid-firing ‖color:gui.green‖5.45x39‖end‖ assault rifle, developed for CQC. Quickly loses its effectiveness with range due to its high recoil and generally bad accuracy.
SP-57A Repetierpistole An automatic pistol of austrian origin, a common choice amongst bodyguards and private security services even on Europa, thanks to its effectiveness against armor, high magazine capacity and decent firerate. Chambered in ‖color:gui.green‖5.7x28‖end‖. FNE Compact Light pistol, chambered in standard ‖color:gui.green‖5.7x28‖end‖. Incredible penetration power of this round and ‖color:gui.blue‖an ability to shoot underwater‖end‖ made this pistol a reliable choice for self defence. M50 Experimental Pistol Experimental automatic pistol, chambered in standard ‖color:gui.green‖5.7x28‖end‖. All essential parts are made entirely of alien materials. MP-57KT A rapid firing micro-smg, chambered in ‖color:gui.green‖5.7x28‖end‖. Deadly almost for anyone on point-blank, this weapon suffers from low accuracy and round's lethality. ‖color:gui.red‖Jams underwater‖end‖. FNE-SO X8 Advanced ‖color:gui.green‖5.7x28‖end‖, designed for scouting squads on Earth. Made its way to Europa with their former operators, became famous for its reliability and convenience when shooting.
M-11 Combat Carbine This carbine is chambered in ‖color:gui.green‖.45‖end‖ and uses its own metal clips, instead of standard magazines. Has decent firerate for a semi-automatic weapon, good accuracy and a handy feeding mechanism that automaticly ejects empty clips, making an oddly satisfying sound in the process. MS-45 Special A compact ‖color:gui.green‖.45‖end‖ submachinegun, developed for special-task forces. Being one of the lightest guns of such caliber, it can be easily manipulated with only one hand, but with this comes high recoil and low accuracy. M24 Colt Broadsword Modern ‖color:gui.green‖.45‖end‖ pistol, was used as a sidearm by many special-task forces on Europa. Compact, reliable and deadly, Colt Broadsword poses a great threat to anyone willing to offend you both in ‖color:gui.blue‖water‖end‖ and on land. Unfortunately, fabrication of this pistol was stopped with the collapse of SC Special-Task and now only few of these pistols may be found on wrecks. M19 Army Modern ‖color:gui.green‖.45‖end‖ pistol, designed for military purposes. Reliable weapon with high rate of fire and powerful round. Improvised .45 smg Improvised open-bolt submachinegun, made of rusty pipes and scrap. As all makeshift weapons, this one ‖color:gui.red‖has a chance to jam upon firing‖end‖ and ‖color:gui.red‖is not capable of shooting underwater‖end‖. C-7 Carbine .45 carbine, made for underwater usage. Feeds from standard ‖color:gui.green‖.45‖end‖ pistol magazines. Due to it semi-improvised nature, this weapon ‖color:gui.red‖realises less than 90% of round's potential damage‖end‖. Mk-117 Tactical SMG A burst-fire ‖color:gui.green‖.45‖end‖ submachinegun, developed for coalition assault squads. Burns through ammo quickly, fires at devastaring rates, and despite that, has relativly high accuracy, thanks to it's unique reciever system. Can feed from both ‖color:gui.green‖smg‖end‖ and ‖color:gui.green‖pistol‖end‖ magazines. PDW-323E ‖color:gui.green‖.45‖end‖ Submachinegun, ‖color:gui.blue‖constructed for underwater usage‖end‖. Accuracy and low recoil compensate relatively low rate of fire. M18 Colt Europan Common ‖color:gui.green‖.45‖end‖ pistol, famous for it's firepower and accuracy. ‖color:gui.red‖Jams underwater‖end‖. HKE-95 Police Heavy ‖color:gui.green‖.45‖end‖ submachinegun, based on HK-90 assault rifle. Reliable weapon for close-quarter fights inside submarines and outposts, but it ‖color:gui.red‖is not capable of shooting underwater‖end‖.
W44 Howdah Pistol This quad-barreled ‖color:gui.green‖.44‖end‖ pistol's main purpose is self defence against hostile fauna. Capable of firing all of its barrels in quick succession Howdah is able to stop even the most fearsome predators in their tracks. This pistol ‖color:gui.red‖doesnt have a recocking mechanism‖end‖ which means it has to be ‖color:gui.red‖manually reloaded‖end‖ and re-cocked every 4 shots. RKX-5 Commando A modified version of standard RKX-5 revolver. Comes with a ‖color:gui.orange‖suppressor‖end‖, red dot sight and a ‖color:gui.orange‖laser pointer‖end‖. Inner parts are replaced with their analogs made from alien materials. Uses .44 ammunition. RKX-5 Revolver Revolver for space export, 5th model. Not the most famous russian weapon, but certainly one of the best. Chambered in ‖color:gui.green‖.44‖end‖, this revolver is an ideal choice for respectors of firepower and relaibility. Pipe revolver(.44) Makeshift revolver out of pipes. As all improvised weapons, this one ‖color:gui.red‖has a chance to jam upon firing‖end‖ and ‖color:gui.red‖is not capable of shooting underwater‖end‖. Chiappa Model-44 automatic revolver Powerful revolver, chambered in standard ‖color:gui.green‖.44‖end‖. Has a relatively faster firing speed, making its the deadliest revolver in close combat, however, this model lacks accuracy. Ares-44 Heavy selfloading ‖color:gui.green‖.44‖end‖ pistol featuring an internal magazine with 7 round capacity. Unlike many pistols, this one boasts a massive recoil spring and a gas piston assembly, which makes it technically more of a rifle, than a typical pistol, in terms of its internal design. M-144 Lever Action Simple, yet effective lever-action ‖color:gui.green‖.44‖end‖ rifle, ‖color:gui.blue‖designed for underwater‖end‖ hunting, but can be used as a rapid-firing combat rifle with great accuracy alongside powerful ammo.
M-138 Commando A heavily modded version of M-144 lever action gun, rechambered in ‖color:gui.green‖.38‖end‖. The stock was cut off, barrel and tube magazine were shortened. Overall, this rifle was converted to fit the role of a sidearm, that can be operated by one hand. Pipe revolver(.38) Simple improvised revolver, made out of pipes and tool parts. As all improvised weapons, this one ‖color:gui.red‖has a chance to jam upon firing‖end‖ and ‖color:gui.red‖is not capable of shooting underwater‖end‖. RKX-16 Revolver A simple to construct ‖color:gui.green‖.38‖end‖ revolver with a drum for 4 rounds. Poor weight balance and makeshift nature make it feel rather unwieldy, compared to factory-produced alternatives. R-23 Revolver Cheap and so widespread weapon of self-defence. ‖color:gui.red‖Unable to shoot underwater‖end‖. TCC-38 Carbine Started as an experiment, this weapon became wide-spread among miners for it's small size and accuracy. Perfect weapon for defending against unarmored species of Europa in caves and ‖color:gui.blue‖even in the depths of ocean‖end‖. Uses ‖color:gui.green‖special .38 magazines‖end‖. Type-72 Special A simple pistol with ‖color:gui.orange‖integrated suppressor‖end‖, capable of firing one ‖color:gui.green‖.38‖end‖ round with incredible accuracy. Was developed a long time ago for chinese special forces on Earth, so ‖color:gui.blue‖performs well under any conditions‖end‖. Became wide-spread among criminals for its cheapness and obscurity. R-43 Automatic Revolver Fast-firing ‖color:gui.green‖.38‖end‖ revolver, ‖color:gui.blue‖capable of underwater shooting‖end‖. Holds 7 rounds. K-12 Gemini A unique twin-barrel ‖color:gui.green‖.38‖end‖ rifle with integrated magazine holding up to 10 rounds. Both barrels fire at the same time forming a precise and dealy burst of two bullets.

Flak stun shells box A box of heavy rounds, each carrying a fulgurium warhead, creating stunning fields upon detonation. Chemical flak shells box A box of heavy rounds with sulphuritin payload, creating a screen of deadly gas upon detonation. Slug flak shells box A box of heavy blunt rounds that do not carry any explosives. Contains 33 shells instead of 25. Fin-stabilised chaingun ammo box These rounds come with stabilisation fins, greatly enhancing their accuracy and effective range as a result. Coilgun dementonite ammo box A belt of coilgun rounds with warheads of solid neurotoxin, applying Dementonite Poisoning. Coilgun chemical ammo box Rounds poison enemies with deadly acid, dealing damage over time. Piercing laser fuel box Improved lence in conjunction with a more reactive mixture form a focused ray, capable of piercing hulls and thick shells while retaining good striking power. Depleted fuel chaingun ammo box A box of 20mm sub-caliber rounds with depleted uranium core. Probably the most effective chaingun ammo in terms of armor piercing. Coilgun incendiary ammo box A box of heavy coilgun rounds, inflicting severe burns upon detonation. Can cause fires if used inside hulls. Chemical railgun shell Upon detonation this railgun shell emmits a cloud of toxic corrosive gas, burning anyone withing its radius. Chemical mixture reacts violently in contact with hulls and ice. Coilgun scattering ammo box After exiting the barrel rounds split into three separate bolts, dealing massive damage to unarmored targets. Mining laser fuel box This mixture creates a cascade of beams that result in a massive seismic resonance upon hit. This resonance detaches minerals from ice and deals great damage to hulls and armour alike. It proved to be ineffective against the local wildlife, however. Unstable laser fuel box The component's reaction in this fuel mixture is unpredictable. It will usually create an impulse slightly weaker than a normal laser, but with a chance of around 20% for a powerful energy blast, forming a ray with 20% more damage. R&D also claims there's a rare chance that this reaction can lead to a massive energy discharge, overdriving laser systems and dealing triple damage. Dementonite chaingun ammo box A box of 20mm chaingun rounds with caps of solid neurotoxin, disorienting any enemy on hit. However, they have diminished armour piercing capabilities compared to standard rounds. Cartridge railgun shell This railgun shell uses a cartridge filled with explosives to boost its velocity. Incredible speed and armour piercing but cartridges must be refilled after every shot. APHE railgun shell This shell carries a heavy explosive charge covered with an AP cap. It explodes after piercing the armour, dealing massive internal damage. Chitin railgun shell A chitin cap that splinters after piercing an enemy, creating a huge amount of fragments. EMP railgun shell Creates a massive EMP burst upon detonation. Stuns large enemies and damages electronics of enemy submarine. Shockwave laser fuel box This unique fuel box comes with a shockwave transductor instead of lenses. Upon firing it creates a massive shock impulse, stunning and damaging enemies in the area around the turret. Welding laser fuel box This fuel box turns the pulse laser into a powerful welding tool. The damage values are a bit lower compared to the regular pulse laser. Coilgun jet ammo box Each shell is armed with a ballistic warhead and a torpedo jet engine. Effective against fast moving or heavily armoured targets. Coilgun Fulgurium ammo box These shells carry a Fulgurium warhead which shocks every enemy on impact. Coilgun armour piercing ballistic capped ammo box Piercing ammo with a ballistic cap that splinters inside enemies, causing higher internal damage. Coilgun Flak ammo box This box contains high-calibre explosive coilgun rounds with a simple sonar detonator on each. After being fired, they will explode not only on contact but also in proximity to anything they pass. Explosive chaingun ammo box Box of chaingun ammunition with a plastic explosive warhead. Effective at both tearing fleshy targets apart and blasting through submarine's hull. Chaingun scattering ammo box Shells splinter after being fired. Effective against swarms of enemies or large unarmoured creatures. Dementonite poisoning Patient's vision is blurred. Their head hurts terribly and they are struggling with movement and navigation. Dies from dementonite poisoning You have died from dementonite poisoning Direct infusion Vampirism Direct infusion Punishment
Attachable barrel module(Direct infusion) A Module that can be attached to the beginning of weapons barrel. Successful hits on creatures give wielder short bursts of healing. Missed shots cause health loss. Can be attached to ‖color:gui.green‖7.62x55‖end‖ firearms. Attachable barrel module(Passive protection) A Module that can be attached to the beginning of weapons barrel. Decreases incoming physical damage by 20% while you are aiming. Can be attached to ‖color:gui.green‖7.62x55‖end‖ firearms. Tactical laser pointer A red laser pointer that can be attached to a firearm instead of the tactical flashlight. While active negates the slowdown while aiming effect. Attachable barrel module(Stabiliser) A Module that can be attached to the beginning of weapons barrel. Decreases innitial spread and recoil while you are standing still. Can be attached to ‖color:gui.green‖7.62 Kurz‖end‖ and ‖color:gui.green‖.45‖end‖ firearms. Attachable barrel module(Critical strike) A Module that can be attached to the beginning of weapons barrel. Bullets have a chance to deal extra damage with this module. Can be attached to ‖color:gui.green‖9x19‖end‖, ‖color:gui.green‖7.62 Kurz‖end‖, ‖color:gui.green‖.38‖end‖ and ‖color:gui.green‖5.7x28‖end‖ firearms. Works with any ammunition. Attachable barrel module(Brimstone) A Module that can be attached to the beginning of weapons barrel. Bullets create small clouds of damaging corrosive gas upon impacting surface or creature. Can be attached to ‖color:gui.green‖5.45x39‖end‖, ‖color:gui.green‖5.56x45‖end‖ and ‖color:gui.green‖9x39‖end‖ assault rifles. Does not work with homing and depleted fuel ammunition. Attachable barrel module(Hellfire) A Module that can be attached to the beginning of weapons barrel. Can be attached to ‖color:gui.green‖shotguns‖end‖, works only with standard and non-lethal buckshot. Pellets ignite target, causing to suffer from damage-over-time effect for up to 15 seconds.
